Oshodi Transport Interchange dị na mpaghara Oshodi nke Lagos State, Nigeria
Ebe bọs ahụ dị n'etiti Lagos-Apapa Expressway na Agege Motor Road
A na-ekewa ọdụ ụgbọ ala Oshodi n'ime ọdụ atọ dị iche iche a na-akpọ: Terminal 1, Terminal 2, na Terminal 3.
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ a na-akpọ Planet Projects Limited wuru Oshodi Bus Terminal
E mere atụmatụ na owuwu nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ ga-efu ihe dị ka $ 70 nde
E wuru ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ iji kwado ihe dị ka bọs 820.
A na-ekewa ọdụ ụgbọ ala Oshodi n'ime ọdụ atọ a na-akpọ: Terminal 1, Terminal 2, na Terminal 3

Nke ọ bụla n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ ala nwere square mita 30,000 ma gụnye ọtụtụ ihe ndị gụnyere: ebe a na-ebudata, ebe a na na-etinye tiketi, ebe ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala, ebe a-adọba ụgbọala, ụlọ mposi na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ. Oshodi Bus Terminal malitere ọrụ na Mee 2019 dị ka onye ọrụ ngo na-ahụ maka ọrụ ahụ mara ọkwa.
Terminal 1 bụ maka njem n'etiti steeti, a haziri ya maka ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, FCT, na steeti ndị dị n'ebe ugwu. Terminal nke abụọ bụ maka ụzọ ndị dị n'etiti obodo
Ikeja, Agege, Iyana Ipaja, egbeda, Abule Egba wdg

Terminal 3 na-aga ụzọ dị ka Mile 2/Festac, ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu, Bariga/New Garage, Tincan, Orile, Apapa/Wharf, ejigbo, Ajegunle/Boundary, Ojodu/Berger, Gbagada/Anthony, Eko Ijumota, Iyana Isolo/Jakande Gate/ Itire, Ojota/Ketu/Mile 12, Adeniji, Eko Hotel.

Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari nyere iwu ka Oshodi Bus Terminal na 24 Eprel, na afọ 2019, onye ọzọ nọkwa maka ọrụ ahụ bụ Gọvanọ mbụ nke steeti Lagos, Akinwunmi Ambode, Gọvanor ugbu a, Babajide Sanwoolu, Abiola Ajimobi, Ibikunle Amosun na ndị ọzọ.
N'okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke Oshodi, ndị na-eto eto si n'ógbè ndị na-enweghị mmekọrịta na-egwu chess
N'ọnwa Disemba na afọ 2021, Fawaz Adeoye, onye na-enweghị ebe obibi dị afọ iri na itoolu, meriri asọmpi distrikti ọnwa ole na ole mgbe mbụ a kpọbatara ya na egwuregwu ahụ.
